title: Black Mirror Season 1 2 3 + Special Complete 720p x264-KmCrct
description: Black Mirror is an amazing show showing the dark consequences of life and technology that our world might face in different realities. Season 1 has the english and italian audio. All audio is AAC 2.0 ~160 kbps. All video is ~1500 kbps with increased sharpness and coloring so that a small file size is maintained with a high quality picture. I ask you to download other versions and compare quality versus size. I am confident you will choose to keep this one. PLEASE SEED IT. Season 4 will be added so that it goes into the same folder when released. Extra time was spent syncing and creating subtitle files. Some of these subtitles can only be found in this torrent because I created them. The 'White Christmas' Special is included and all files are numbered to match the release date as indicated on the wikipedia page. I urge you to download and install the Media Preview app by BabelSoft to show the tumbnails correctly. It's like 15meg app and totally worth your time to see the metadata as thumbnail, you will need to set it up. just google it and dl and install its worth it you can always remove it if you dont like. Free and useful. Dont enable file icons, instead enable all video and audio types.
